name: Tap Symbol
description: It is the process of rotating a permanent sideways to activate abilities or to declare attackers.

name: Untap Symbol
description: It is the process of rotating a permanent back to the upright position, you untap during the beginning step.

name: White Mana
description: Symbol for white mana, usually generated by the Plains land type.

name: Blue Mana
description: Symbol for blue mana, usually generated by the Island land type.

name: Black Mana
description: Symbol for black mana, usually generated by the Swamp land type.

name: Red Mana
description: Symbol for red mana, usually generated by the Mountain land type.

name: Green Mana
description: Symbol for green mana, usually generated by the Forest land type.

name: Colourless Mana
description: Symbol for Colourless mana, usually generated by artifacts or special lands.

name: X Symbol
description: A variable cost for a spell, is usually stated on a card what that cost should be
